question: International Day of Radiology is celebrated all over the world on which date?
explanation: World Radiography Day is observed on 8 November since 2007. The European Society of Radiology (ESR) in 2011 resolved that there should be a celebration regarding radiology annually to mark the discovery of X-Radiation done by Roentgen on 8 November 1895.International Day of Radiology event is organized by the International Society of Radiographers and Radiological Technologists (ISRRT). The theme of International Radiology Day 2019 is Sports Imaging. The imaging professionals play specific roles in detection, diagnosis, prognosis, and treatment of sports-related injuries, increases the quality of care and treatment of patients.
